message.content:
cs.IR, cs.DL, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.SD

Reasoning: The paper discusses the dynamics of communication networks and the codification of knowledge, which are relevant to several sub-fields in computer science. The focus on scientific communication and evolving literatures suggests a connection to information retrieval (cs.IR) and digital libraries (cs.DL). The discussion of networks and trajectories may also be relevant to social informatics (cs.SI) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the concept of discursive knowledge could be related to software engineering (cs.SE) or systems and control (cs.SY).
